casebody.data:
Yvon AUGUSTIN, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Florida, Appellee. Case No. 2D18-469 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed December 19, 2018 Rachael E. Reese of O'Brien Hatfield, P.A., Tampa, Appellant. Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Marilyn Muir Beccue, Assistant Attorney General, Tampa, for Appellee. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.

NORTHCUTT, BLACK, and BADALAMENTI, JJ., Concur.
